hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:When the Prophet (ﷺ) arrived at Mecca, some boys of the tribe of Bani `Abdul Muttalib went to receive him, and the Prophet (ﷺ) made one of them ride in front of him and the other behind him

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِقْبَالِ الْحَاجِّ الْقَادِمِينَ وَالثَّلاَثَةِ عَلَى الدَّابَّةِ
